channel.title: Characters on The Aetherway
channel.description: Recent content in Characters on The Aetherway

item.title: Millennium Whoop
item.description:
A wandering interdimensional being

Learning new things as she explores the Aetherway

Moving along with her surrounding’s flow

Enjoying her own existence

Her deepest desire is to making her dimension a prettier, cooler place

One day she hopes to become The President of the Galaxy

They say her positive vibes are contagious

People ask themselves “How can she flow like that?”

And for that, the answer is…

That’s her Aetherway.

What’s yours?

item.title: Lady Entanglement
item.description: She weaves the invisible threads between all things, connecting them in ways that defy distance or time, tying together people, places and moments. The worship of Lady Entanglement is typically done on a ceremony where people share a meal of spaghetti or ramen together, sharing experiences about how their lives have intertwined with others.

item.title: Lady Thread
item.description:
She’s so good with hair that people often call on her to find their thread of thought. If you’ve lost yours, here’s a little prayer to help you find it:

Lady Thread, goddess of memory and recollection. I lost my thoughts in my head’s tangled mess. Please help me find those loose ends.

PS: Your hair is the prettiest of all Ladies.

This last part is the most important. You see, when dealing with deities, it’s important to suck up to them.

item.title: Lady Spiral
item.description: Her presence is often felt in moments when everything begins to spiral out of control. Whether she is the cause of the chaos or simply a witness to it remains a mystery.

item.title: Lady Zero
item.description: Lady Zero was drawn to a mysterious cave, but each time she approached, she was met with mocking laughter from within. Despite her curiosity, fear held her back. One day, summoning her courage, Lady Zero laughed defiantly at the cave and ventured inside. After exploring its wonders, she returned and noticed a small, child-sized footprint facing the opposite direction—her own, but smaller. To her surprise, instead of laughter, she heard applause coming from the cave.

item.title: Lady Herself
item.description: Lady Nobody admired Lady Somebody and wished to become like her. She used the Dreamer’s Mirror to see herself as Lady Somebody, but instead of a reflection, the mirror showed nothing. Overwhelmed by this emptiness, Lady Nobody finally accepted her own identity. As she did, the mirror began to shine brightly. When the light faded, it revealed Lady Herself, her true self. This moment marked her acceptance of who she truly was.
